title: What are the most interesting jobs or companies to work remotely? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi Alejandra, You asked, Which ones are the most interesting remote jobs to have, and why is that? What CoolWorks offers is pretty neat. An opportunity to do seasonal work in vacation destinations such as Yosemite and other state parks, etc. What better way to enjoy the outdoors while meeting customers and getting paid. Check out their offerings on their website.
